name: Spoopy Christmas
description:
Spoopy Christmas

Controls are (A,S,D,W,) to move Left, Right, Up, Down.. 
(Objective, try and see the highest score you can achieve within while protecting the Christmas tree from the little ominous creatures.)

_The characters_ Player - Bonbon   

Please be aware, there may be bugs. 

Credits: Art was done by me.  I also had some help with coding from a buddy. 

Sounds and Music: bart ... Tozan
